item.content:encoded: IMAGE: Polygon Games and TV love to make Washington Weird The Pacific Northwest is creepy. From the dark forests of Alan Wake, to the ghostly radios of Oxenfree, to the absolute freaks who populate Deadly Premonition, so many games set in the ol‚Äô Pacific Northwest give it that weird sauce. This trend of Weird Pacific Northwest exists outside of games too ‚Äî from quirky characters in Portlandia to the terrifyingly wet environment of The Ring. I wanted to know why that is, so I started looking. I...
